data.expected_result: The taskbar button should blink exactly the same way it does when you minimize using the _ button of the title bar or when you switch window without minimizing
data.short_description: If the window was minimized using the taskbar button, the button doesn't blink when a notification is received
data.steps_to_repro: - Minimize the window using the taskbar button - Receive a message and get a desktop notification
